summary: Tempers fray and true selves are revealed when a heterosexual is accidentally invited to a homosexual party.
cast: Kenneth Nelson|Frederick Combs|Cliff Gorman|Laurence Luckinbill|Keith Prentice|Peter White|Reuben Greene|Robert La Tourneaux|Leonard Frey|Maud Adams|Elaine Kaufman
title: Los chicos de la banda
